snippet: British holidays and airline company Monarch [MONA.UL] has been  acquired by investment firm Greybull Capital which will pump 125 million pounds into the company as it turns itself into a budget airline....
lead_paragraph: British holidays and airline company Monarch [MONA.UL] has been  acquired by investment firm Greybull Capital which will pump 125 million pounds into the company as it turns itself into a budget airline.
